banner.hi: Hello! Thanks for coming. Make yourself at home, I'll tell you a little about who I am and the path that brought me here.

about.about-subtitle: I'm Frontend Developer & Full Stack Student from Argentina
about.about-me: Passionate about programming, creating, and imagining, with a dedicated two-year study in the field. Quick learner and proactive team player.
about.exp-one: 2019-2020: Assistant Pastry Chef in a company with over 500 diners
about.exp-two: 2020-2021: Manager at a retail and wholesale store
about.exp-three: 2021-to date: Owner of a fresh food market.

services.i-am-a-frontend: I am a front-end developer with additional back-end knowledge

work.i-show-you: I show you my latest academic projects and personal designs, hoping that we can work together
